price: 54.Nabii Huud mari:Huudow atu tet (Yallitte kinnuk) qibaadak nee waasseemih sabbatah Ni Yallittek garab koo gaynaqeeh (yiqintireeh) koo cabboyseh inna nee akke waytek kalah kok innam mannu kaak iyyen, Nabii Huud keenil gacisak : diggah anu axceh aniimil Yalla sumaaqisaah isin Yallat agleytiitih haytaanamak anu bari kinniyoomuh sin sumaaqisak isin yoh sumaaqita keenik iyye.
arabic: إِن نَّقُولُ إِلَّا ٱعۡتَرَىٰكَ بَعۡضُ ءَالِهَتِنَا بِسُوٓءٖۗ قَالَ إِنِّيٓ أُشۡهِدُ ٱللَّهَ وَٱشۡهَدُوٓاْ أَنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: in naqūlu illā iʿ'tarāka baʿḍu ālihatinā bisūin qāla innī ush'hidu al-laha wa-ish'hadū annī barīon mimmā tush'rikūna
